name: organic-stem-k8s-get-pods

scripts.release-patch: npm run test && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --tags && git push origin master
scripts.release-minor: npm run test && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --tags && git push origin master
scripts.release-major: npm run test && npm version major && npm publish && git push --tags && git push origin master

author: Boris Filipov
description: a helper for organic-stem-skeleton 2.1 based cells for listing matching pods
